cn.crowdos.kernel.system.resource

类 MissionHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.crowdos.kernel.system.resource.MissionHistory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Resource<MissionHistory>

    public class MissionHistory
extends Object
implements Resource<MissionHistory>
    MissionHistory records all active and completed missions in the system.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0.1
    作者:
    loyx
    另请参阅:
    Mission

      • getUnfinishedMissions

        public List<Mission> getUnfinishedMissions()
        The getUnfinishedMissions function returns a list of all the missions that are unfinished.
        返回:
        A list of all the unfinished missions in the missions field

      • getFinishedMissions

        public List<Mission> getFinishedMissions()
        The getFinishedMissions function returns a list of all the finished missions.
        返回:
        A list of finished missions

      • getMissionsByTask

        public List<Mission> getMissionsByTask(Task task)
        The getMissionsByTask function returns a list of missions that belong to the task passed in as an argument.
        参数:
        task - Filter the missions by task
        返回:
        A list of missions that belong to a specific task

      • getMissionsByParticipant

        public List<Mission> getMissionsByParticipant(Participant participant)
        The getMissionsByParticipant function returns a list of missions that the participant is involved in.
        参数:
        participant - Filter the missions
        返回:
        A list of missions that a participant is involved in

      • getHandler

        public SystemResourceHandler<MissionHistory> getHandler()
        The getHandler function is used to return a SystemResourceHandler object that can be used to access the MissionHistory object. This function is required by the SystemResource interface, and it allows for a MissionHistory object to be accessed as if it were an instance of its parent class, which in this case is SystemResource. The getHandler function returns an anonymous inner class that implements the abstract methods of the SystemResourceHandler interface. In this case, there are two such methods: getResourceView() and getResource(). Both functions simply return "this", or in other words they
        指定者:
        getHandler 在接口中 Resource<MissionHistory>
        返回:
        A SystemResourceHandler object
